# Exploration Stations

# Introductions

  • Explore our short activities found on the left side of this page. As you go through the activities, start thinking about how you could incorporate these into your classroom.

  • With the teachers at your station, take 15 minutes to discuss some ideas that you have on how you could use Scratch, AI, or Micro:bit to enhance your student‚Äôs learning.

  • Fill out a note document, a chance to present your discoveries to your peers in a short pitch.

Inspiration

Watch how this group of students created ‚Äúinventions‚Äù to help solve world problems by incorporating various technologies, building prototypes and testing their findings!

UN global goals

# Explorations

2 Activities - 45 min each

Once you have completed two of the activities, select one person to take notes on your group discussion. We have already created note documents for you, you can find it here:

  • Find your table number and open the corresponding document:
  • PRESENTATIONS NOTES
  • Because the notes are captured on a drive you will be able to access other group's ideas
